LanguageData.rjw_vatgrown_sex_slave.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]被塑造成一个性爱玩具、而非作为人类长大。在[PAWN_possessive]成长期中，[PAWN_pronoun]被灌输了很多与性爱有关的技能和社交技能，以满足其主人的需求。
LanguageData.rjw_vatgrown_sex_slave.title: 人造人性奴
LanguageData.rjw_feisty.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]生来便渴望征服，若是你在[PAWN_possessive]索求时敢说不，便会对你重拳出击。
LanguageData.rjw_feisty.title: 活泼流莺
LanguageData.rjw_curious.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]喜欢制造各种东西，尤其是能提供新鲜体验的东西。
LanguageData.rjw_curious.title: 好奇流莺
LanguageData.rjw_tender.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]有着一双动人的眼睛，并且[PAWN_possessive]的声音绵软甜美。由于[PAWN_possessive]之前从事的护士工作，[PAWN_pronoun]可以很好的照料人们。
LanguageData.rjw_tender.title: 温婉流莺
LanguageData.rjw_chatty.baseDesc: No one can be more loquacious than [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] has a flexible tongue, a sharp mind, and hot lips.
LanguageData.rjw_chatty.title: 健谈流莺
LanguageData.rjw_broken.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] suffered some terrible things, [PAWN_pronoun] looks rather emaciated.
LanguageData.rjw_broken.title: 崩坏流莺
LanguageData.rjw_homekeeper.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained to be a housekeeper. Would you like dinner? A bath? Or perhaps...[PAWN_possessive]?.
LanguageData.rjw_homekeeper.title: 管家流莺
